## Question 1

```{r}
crab = read.table("data/HW5-crab.txt", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Poisson model M1
m1 <- glm(
  Sa ~ W,
  family = poisson(link = log),
  data = crab)

summary(m1)

# Goodness of fit
# Deviance
m1_D = sum(residuals(m1, type = "deviance") ^ 2)

# Pearson chi-square
m1_G = sum(residuals(m1, type = "pearson") ^ 2)

m1_df = 173 - 2

1 - pchisq(m1_D, m1_df)
```
